txt_en: Not he who has much is rich, but he who gives much.
txt_cn: 拥有的多并不算富有，给予的多才算富有。
author: Erich Fromm

txt_en: Life is not merely being alive, but being well.
txt_cn: 生活不只是活着，而是精彩地活着。
author: Marcus Valerius Martialis

txt_en: It always seems impossible until it's done.
txt_cn: 事情未成功之前，总看似不可能完成。
author: Nelson Mandela

txt_en: I truly believe there's always a solution to every problem.
txt_cn: 我确信，每个问题都有解决方案。
author: Maira Kalman

txt_en: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
txt_cn: 掌握命运的是我们自己，而不是天上的星星。
author: William Shakespeare

txt_en: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
txt_cn: 我从未梦想成功，我只向着成功努力。
author: Estée Lauder

txt_en: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
txt_cn: 能改变生活的只有我自己，没有人能替我改变。
author: Carol Burnett

txt_en: Nothing is more highly to be prized than the value of each day.
author: Johann Wolfgangvon Goethe

txt_en: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the face.
txt_cn: 永远不要垂下头。要高昂着头，直面这世界。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
txt_cn: 知生命之意者，可承生命之重。
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

txt_en: The memories we make with our family are everything.
txt_cn: 我们和家人一起创造的记忆最为重要。
author: Candace Cameron Bure
